author: Discount Office
body: The only app I could get to work the way I wanted. Works amazingly well. Only gripe is because I have a large category tree (and I mean really big), I have to do a manual workaround but most sites won't have that issue. Highly recommended++++

author: Vintro
body:
This app is amazing - it makes having sub categories so much easier to do, and it has great tutorials.
This is a must have for anyone that wants to have sub categories.
It is also has a great sidebar function which makes it easy to create and manage a sidebar.
